body.raw:
{
  "name": "Sprunk",
  "description": "“If you want all of the taste with none of the waist. try our new improved Diet Sprunk. We replaced the sugar with cancerous neurotoxins — you'll never know the difference!”. \n Sprunk is a carbonated lemon-lime beverage claimed in a Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas radio commercial to contain 10 times the caffeine and sugar, mixed with mercury, ether, and benzene, and packaged in fragmentation grenade-shaped cans. The company's slogan since Grand Theft Auto IV has been The Essence of Life",
  "gameName": "GTA V",
  "posterUrl": "https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/gtawiki/images/9/96/Sprunk-HDUniverse-Logo.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/350?cb=20180523124658",
  "tags": [
    "Slurp Slurp Mmmm!",
    "A Taste of Things to Come...",
    "The Essence of Life",
    "Slurp Sprunk Mmm! Delicious",
    "Overclock your life"
  ],
  "imageUrls": [
    "https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/gtawiki/images/9/9d/Sprunk-GTAIV-Wallpaper.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/185?cb=20210817070230",
    "https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/gtawiki/images/6/6e/Sprunk-Extreme.PNG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/185?cb=20091218035512",
    "https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/gtawiki/images/b/bb/SprunkBenson-GTAIV-front.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/185?cb=20160811161532",
    "https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/gtawiki/images/b/b7/SprunkExtremePony-GTAV-front.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/185?cb=20180608153231",
    "https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/gtawiki/images/e/e3/Bati801RR-GTAV-front-Sprunk.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/185?cb=20160214210359",
    "https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/gtawiki/images/3/34/SprunkBuffalo-GTAVPC-front.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/185?cb=20150529175841"
  ]
}
